values:
I'm so in love with Ryan.  Its really hard now that hes at college.  But i will get to see him on the weekends and when he comes home during the week.  LIKE TOMORROW!  I am so excited i cant wait to see him!  I'm gunna run and jump on him!  Give him the biggest and bestest kiss he's ever had!  Hes picking me up form school tomorrow.
  He's such a dork, but hes MY dork!  Stay away bitches! i will kick anyones ass who even THINKS of trying to take him from me!
  He's so good to me too.  I wish he was here right now.  I mean after living with him for three weeks and falling asleep next to him every night and waking up next to him every morning, its weird sleeping in my own bed, sleeping is weird ion general now that hes not here. Im used to being with him every day.
  I guess this is gunna take some getting used to, but i know that he and i will make through in the very end.  I mean as long as we try right?  I don't care that hes an hour away, his distance from me doesn't nor will it ever change how i feel about him. He makes me smile when i have no reason to, he makes me laugh when i'm crying, he wipes the tears from my eyehes my teddy bear at night.  HJe means everything to me.
  I love him so much.

Baby I love you.

Sis your the best ever, i can't wait until we have our first road trip.  It should be lots of fun.

Peace out all!

i dont even know where to begin.  Ryan is going off to college tomorrow, so tonights our last night together.  We're not breaking up, we're gunna do the whole long distance see you once a week thing.  Whenever i think about it i start to cry.  this is gunna be really hard for me.  but i love him and i swear to try my hardest to make it all work out for the better.

YEYA!  Im goign to the greenday concert in like twenty minutes! Natalie is sitting here with me and her, me, my cuzin, and hopefully my boyfriend are all gunna be going.  Its gunna be SICK!  To all yall suckers that aint going....... HAHA!
  Anyways I have been living at my boyfriends house... its been great.  Falling asleep next to him, waking up with a kiss from him.  Its just been wonderful.  
  Please if there is anything good outthere, DONT LET ME FUCK THIS UP!  I have been hurt way to many times and have been hurting for too long,  my heart can't take anymore pain.
  Natalie is awesome! she also says she is single and looking. HAHA  Come on guys shes great! I'd Date her!
  Alrigth well back to looking up shit!

I love you Baby.

Peace

HAHAHA!!!  So She seems to think that she can get me kicked outa school?  thats hillarious. Oh my god. Its like they think i'm gunna want to go and kill myself over all of this bullshit.  Im happier than can be and nuthing can or will bring me down.  Life is so good right now.  I mean what is the worst that could happen, Mallory will sick her little pitbulls on me? Amber Sherri and Tina?  oh i'm really scared.  Whatever guys.

I knew Mallory was a bitch but i didn't think she was that bad.  first she dates my ex fiance which was bad anough and now shes doing the same shit to Crispy, whom she supposedly loved?  WHAT A BITCH!  not to mentiopn she is causing all sorts of drama in my journal.  if you don't like some one then you don't talk to them... Mallory, go back to all your dramaful friends and have fun...  I can't wait to be the one to get you kicked out of Marshwood for living in Dover.

Sis:  MAn that sux... I really wanted to go to friendlys with you again, I had so much fun!

ok so I'm at Ryans house waiting to go to concord with him.  Hes looking for a shoe right now.  Anyways... I love him sooo much.  he makes me so happy.  I can never Actually get mad at him.   Its great I pretend to be mad. then we kiss and make up.  My sister is telling me to be good to this one.   I am .  Don't worry there is no way i want to fuck this one up.  I don't think even Crispy made me this happy.  But then again Chris is so fucked up in the head that he would mess around with my Sister and then date my best friend...  ANYWAYS.  Me and Ryan bought two mice.  Tweak and Daisy (this is actually the second Daisy that I have owned. the first one was a spaz.)  
..::looks for a chair::..
No chair for Sarah.  Its gunna be so hard for me when Ryan goes off to college.  I'm gunna miss him sooo much.  I mean we have been spending every waking moment together.(I found a chair.)  Ive spent the last four nights at his house.  I love him soo much.  Hes siiting in the room being retarded.  Going through his college books and making me all sad.  He doesn't know it though.  He does now cuz I told him.
I'm so fucking tired we had to get up early to go take care of the horses.  HAHA He's so cute.   I love him.  He woke me up this morning with a kiss.  Thats so sweet.
we just invented a new word.... "indianishy."  now he won't let me touch the indianishy knife.   loser.  ok I gotta stop tying like a loser.  I just have nothing interesting to say today. work sucked.  Instead of working games because we were shorthanded I got stuck on the fucking train.... I hate the train.
I'm hungry.
I'm Tired.
I'm out.
Peace.

ok.  firts off i must say my newest boyfriend is amazing.  I fell for him really hard and really fast.  I love being around him.  He is so great.  He makes me so happy. I'm gunna miss him when he goes to college but I know We can make it work.  His name is Ryan Frazier.  He is 18 and will be 19 on the 28th of August.  He drives a Mitsubishi Galant.  And He loves me.  I am really hoping that this one works.  I am so sick of being in shitty relationships with shitty guys.  Anyways.
  So It was me Ryan, Ryans brother Mike, and his girl ( Whom is the shit, I work with her.) Becca.  We all decided that we wanted to go out one night.  We were just driving around laughing our asses off.  we passed places like Busters, Friendlys, Movie Theatres, Bowling Alleys, and Wal Mart, Jokers, and Chuckie Cheeses.  Which place did we go to?  CHUCK E. CHEESES! cuz Ryan wanted to go.  It was so funny.  we walked in the doors and the guy asked us... "you all 18?"  of course we said yes.   Why does it matter? I mean how ca a 17 year old like myself get hurt or lost in CHUCK E. CHEESES???  Anyways, so me and Becca found it absolutely hysterical that we were in there.  We played some games won some tickets, laughed at the guys, cheeted at whack-the-lights(HAHA) and then with the tickest we won, we got me a Mr. Potato Head!!!!!   It was so awesome... we then went to friendlys.  I had to be home at ten or eleven.
  My next adventure was with my sister, her boyfriend Glen Me and Ryan.  First we all went to busters to play pool, where we realized that me and my sister suck.  the guys totally kicked our asses.  Anyways then wee went out to dinner at friendlys.  Big Mistake!  HAHA me and sis were playing paper football and giggling like crazy.  I put GLenns elbow in Ketchup, after mae mae pured it on some left over cole slaw.  the guys decided that we can't go anywhere together.  It was great.  acting like three year olds laughing our asses off, and having the time of our lives.
  I hope i get to see Ryan today, even though  I just spent the past three nights at his house. I dunno I just don't get sick of seeing him.  Mum Said if i clean my room I can see him when he gets outa work. What she don't knqo is i woulda seen him neways cux i would have told him to come over whether it was clean or not.
  Anyways I gotta go get back to cleaning.

I love you Babe.

My big Sister Is the SHit! I love you!

See Ya'll Lata!

Wow,  I guess I really don't have any friends.  I mean really... has anyone seen what Mallory last wrote about me?   I mean what the hell?  It isn't my fault he talks about me.  I don't control how his mind works and what rolls out of his big mouth,  (there are some things he has said that i wish he wouldn't have but did/does anyways.)
  Mallory I hate to say it but I have to.  Listen to me.  YOu have him.  You have won ok?  I already told him even if the two of you did break up, I wouldn't go back to him.  So you have him. 
  YOu know what? Fuck it.  Cunt am i?  Bitch am I?  I don't care  I find it a compliment to know that chris can't get me out of his head.  Fine...  I don't care.  Bye.

ok the reason i called you was to say that i miss you.  I know sometimes we don't get along but you are my sister.  I guess i was just being childish.  write me back so we can start over again. again.

yeha, so i have yet another boyfriend who is leaving me... Chris Beames.  we have been dating for a week and he will be moving to florida in less than two.  it's the same boyfriend as previously mentioned.  but i have come to realize that every time i get even remotely attached they seem to go away.  I hate it.  It's not fair.
  I have also come to realize that i can no longer be afraid.  because if i am to live the rest of my life affraid of everythng then i am to be condemmed to livign in a hospital with some one sitting outside my door while i sleep.
  I also now know that the only true friend i have is me.  I am the only person who will not abandon or leave me alone in the dark.  I have to be strong,  i have to love myself in order to get by.
  i hate the heat.  it makes me throw up every morning and dehydrates me.  ugh i have to be to work soo too.  just what i need more heat.  although i must say that i do love gteting  paid to stand around and press buttons all day.
Well i guess I am to now wait for my ride.  Later.

haha  i just remembered the time that we left jesus at irving!!! HAHAHA  "ya'll bitches goin ta hell!"

ok i feel better now

ok, ever since i broke up with Chris I have had the worst luck with boyfriends.  first one disapeared then re-apeared and expected that i was still his, WRONG! second one was a pervert, and the third one m,oved away to biddeford and didn't even tell me so yeah he's done.
  i once again have a new boyfriend... yeah yeah yeah i know right? i won't say who it is, ya'll who are close to me can just guess...  some of you already know.  He's an old ex, from freshman year.  no it aint kyle either.
Mallory you can prolly guess who it is. i have been hanging out with him alot lately, and no it ain't jimmy either.
  I'm trying to find my pictures online... i gotta get them off.  anyways... if you can help me out, lemme know.

Ok lets start with the good news....

1) Me and Mallory are still best friends.
2) I am dating this awesome guy named Mike Wright. 
3) Mom is gunna let me have my eyebrow ring.
4) 2 more months until i'm seventeen!
5) I still have my job at the kingdom.
6) I am still doing good in tutoring.
7) Me and Chris Beams are friends again.

And then the Bad news....

1) I haven't heard from Mike in Four days.

At the rate you are going, how will the rest of your life pan out?

  I' sorry Sis, But:

(Sounds of someone puking)

GRR!!! I HAD A WHOLE ENTRY TYPED AN I PRESSED SOME FUCKIGN BUTTON ON TE KEYBOARD AND IT ALL GOT DELETED!!!  ARG!  NOW I GOTTA DO IT ALL OVER AGAIN!

Well ok ready, GO!

i got outa bed this morning and put on a pair of pants. when i looked in the mirror my ass was huge!  it may even be bigger than Mass Ass Girls!  Oh No!
haha Sorry Emma!

Block got a tattoo yesterday.  it is the most original one i have ever seen, no one is going to have it. 

But uh i have to go and work on something for my parents i'll add to this later, its their aniversary.

OMG!!! i had a flip out session because i am so fucking of tutoring,( i mean i really dont see a point of continuing it after all, i am pretty much failing.)  and i started yelling about how much life sucks and mom was like.... so much for the surprise Green Day tickets me and chris got for you!!! 

I calmed down a little bit later, but what the hell they got me GReen Day tickets for my birthday!

I hope Mallory gets a ticket too!  that would be soo sweet!!!

Not to mention now i got a job.   I work at Yorks wild animal kingdom.  I start this saturday.  Rory and David work there too and Mal is trying for the job as well... I hope she gets it.

( mom saw a comercial for "sparkle" secret deoderant and she thought there was glitter in it, i mean really...)

I went swimming in the river at the boat launch today. it was so awesome... a tad bit cold... but still awesome... ahah lets just say that i was the only one in a bathing suit.  Jesus and Crispy decided to go in their boxers.  I went in first...  the pussies ahd to run in arm in arm to make sure they both went in at the same time.  It was a lot of fun.

I wish i could hang out with chris more often.  I get to me him and all but i just don't think i see him enough.  Call me dependent but i love him and i just wish i could see him alot more.

Hey i have been hanging out with Mally.  It's been awesome.  I hope me and her get to chill a lot more.  Maybe she can go to the boat launch next time.  I'll throw her in. lol just kidding mallory...

 ok well i have to get ready for that bitch susanna to tear apart my family some more.  Shes this new counselor that is ... well... evil.

Muah!

I love you baby

Mallory you Rock!

Sarah

Today I hung out with with mallory!!!  Yeah i kwo, my life is all coming back now.

I am now talking to mae mae online.  it's not that bad, its your average girl talk.

I got poison Ivy from chris's fucking house today.  it s what happens when u walk through the woulds to roam the golf course.  It s a good thing i love him.
andf i really do too.

Haha me and mae mae are talkign like old times....

Nate beat diablo before i did!

I went out with chris and block for a short while,,, we sat in blocks acar and listened to music.

I'm drinking pepsi and wishing it was a dew.

anyways... maybe i should go to bed soon.

It is getting late and i am kind of tired.  but i wthink i will talk to mae mae for a bit longer.

love to all... especiaslly chris and mallory!!!

Good nite!

It seems to me that everything is on the right track again.   I am starting to get some of my old life back.   Oh i misssed my mally soooo much.  Her and I were like sisters, then when i disapeared she randomly started to hate me.  But something made her realize what was going on,  and now i think we're all friends again.
  Then of course they could all be secretly planning to pull one over on me.  But I won't know until the time comes.  
  I told Mal I would meet up with her whenever she wants, I can't wait to see her.  
  
  Chris took me to the movies today.  We saw StarWars.  It was a pretty good movie.  I'm actually waiting for him to call me when he gets out of work.  (scratch that i'm calling him now, fucking hold music...) maybe I can see him tonight.  0He wants to take me to an art museum tomorrow but I'm still sick because of him.  we'll see how I feel tomorrow.  
 Anyways...  I better get going... I should get some sleep before I go on a midnight stroll.
  Lata

Ok, so i was out with crispy yesterday, we went to the beach and HOLY SHIT! the waves were enormous!... I took some mad pictures. I was introduced to Block. He seemed ok, but He likes Emma. and Emma likes him. and he's tewnty, not like it would be much different tyhan me and chris dating, but it really is because she is like a little sister to me. I love my Mass Ass Girl. I would kill Block if he did anything dirty to her and ruined her innoscence... Plus I know Dad (chris's not Mine) would NOT be too happy about it. Anyways, We now have a banana tree in the living room. it's not real but still...Check out the thing... http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v328/foreverpoisoned/Cool%20Pix/PalmTree.jpg oh my goodness I found this when i was loadign the palm tree picture, and i cried. I love my dad sooo much, and he is aways mad at me and i hate it. Anyways... I have to go and do some school work, talk to ya'll later
what the hell happenee to my life? It used to be so good.... oh well gunna have to start over again.

I miss my Mommy. even though we have our issues it hurts to know that she is mad at me.... I know, i am hard to live with. But that doesn't mean you CAN'T live with me. Mom you are the best, and when chris brings me home I have a Huge surprise for you. I am terribly sorry for the way I am. AN I hope you know i didn't intentionally miss taht meeting with yara. I love you Mom. Sarah

Me and Chris have been dating a month and two days!!!it was a Month on the 11th!  too bad I didn't see him... I don't think....

I love him

DAMNIT!!! I just wrote an entire entry and I hit a button and it all disapeared!!! five fucking Paragraphs!!!! ARGH!!!!

I'll do it later, the bell is gunna ring...

god damn it's been a while...  It's now a new year, Chris is 21 he stayed the night at my house new years ever becasue he had been drinking that night and my parents weren't about to let him go and drive...  He and i are doing pretty good since the last breakup.... we haven't been fighting as much and I am getting better at having good reasons to argue with him... lol... only I shouldn't have any cuz I love him...  
  Anywho... I found a game as addicting as the sims if not more, diablo 2.  Damn I wanna go play... I'm in in school again... heh oops...  Chris brought me to chool this morning, and I was a little late cuz we took a nap in the car... for some reason I was so incredibly tired last night .... and this morning... I still am really tired, but I have counseling after school, so I think I will play diablo until she gets there...
Damn the bell rang... gotta go

as Homer Says...

"Mmmmmmm Beeeeeeeer......"

"Mmmmmmmm  Chocolate...."

"Mmmmmmm Organized Crime..."

I'm thinking my bed is looking Mighty Tempten.... Too bad he can't be there waiting...

Long Day...

Work Tomorrow... YAY!!

Merry Christmas Yall!

Well... Today just had to be.... the absolute.... BEST CHRISTMAS EVER!!!  I spent practically the whole day with Chris...  Which obviously was... awesome.... He gave me the nicest Christmas present... a huge teddy (which makes three stuffed animals for Christmas...Emmma gave me a teddy and Chris bought me a cow...)  A letter, which was a personal thing between he and I... and a CD that has all songs that he thinks were written just for us...  
  I gave him a box of rainbow sharpies... to color on CD R's... Ten CD R's and Blank cases.... a box of condums... (HEH) and a lighter, and a peronalized framed poem that I wrote just for him.... MAYBE I will share taht with you all later.... MAYBE...  We ate Dinner at my house around four, then we ate at his Mom's house around 7...  Watched part of the sound of Music (surprisingly I have never seen that movie...)  And came back to my house around 9:30 and We read " How the Grinch Stole Christmas" together on the couch....  
  Wow... I don't think I can ever Get sick of him, I love him way too damned much!!! I just wanna go to sleep in his arms and wake up so that he is the first thing I see in the morning...  I want to bare his children.... (Lily, Connor, Mark, )
  I love his family too... me and EMmma ( his l;ittle sister) act and hang out like we're sisters... I call his Dad, Dad... and his mom, Mom...  He loves my family to pieces... and I think on our first Christmas in our own place imma get him a Puppy...  Maybe he'll get me a kitten...
  I am still so torn as to the whole Meghan thing, I cannot even bare to hear her name mentioned...
  I have another continueing problem as well, the urge to cut is getting stronger... THe desire to see my own blood fall is getting Greater... The longing to drive a blade into my skin is getting harder and harder to resist...  I'm not exactly entirely sure about if i will be able to fight it forever... but everytime i think about that Meghan thing I cry my soul out, and everytime I cry my soul out, I want to cause my self physical yet un-feelable pain... and the more I want to cause my self this pain... the harder it is for me NOT to cause myself this pain...
  I appear alright to everyone... but no one really knows... knows what I'm feeling, What I am mourning over...The pain and agony that is swallowing my soul, my entire being... taking me from my what once was happy self...
  I can't completely complain, or say I am not at all happy...  I am in love with some one... and I will do whatever it takes to keep him by my side... I will try my hardest to make sure he is happy... I will do whatever I need to to please him... [ well ALMOST whatever...(lol I love you baby)]
  I need him to stand by me... I need him... I can't make it without him... I know he won't hurt me... and I know I will try my hardest never to hurt him...  I love him...
  
 "And now for something completely different" 
  
 "It's........"

 >"Yes"
  >"No!"
 >"No, No, No No NO"
  >"No"
 <"Why did you say yes?"
 > "I didn't"

"Whats on the telly then?"
 > "Looks like a penguin"

" No body expects the spanish inquisition!!!"

"Cardinal! POKE HER... WITH THE SOFT CUSHIONS!"

Ah... I got a new t.v. with a built in DVD player, and I was watching MOnty Python most of the morning... lemme tell ya this... if you haven't seen monty python...

 "YA'LL BITCHES GOIN TA HELL!!!"
ahh... Pat... haha that was soo funny... Damn did I feel bad leaving you there though...  anyways...
  I'm rambling in my journal again...
   Peace out...  I think I will talk to my lover before I hit the bed sack...

Night people!

Hey all... My brother was telling us all for weeks he was gunna wake us up at 9:15... low and behold he is banging on my door at 8:30.... Bastard... lol 

OH MY GOD!!! HIT THE DECK! my brothers got BOWS AND ARROWS!!! AHHH!!!!

My dad got headphones that make it so he cant hear anything outside them.... haha
I called him a douche bag... my mom told him taht me and chris got married last night... notta....
  lol and we ( my mom and I) were dancing and doing the flamingo... and my dad just looks at us and says... oh my god...

I got a tv with a dvd player, a Crystal ball, cow sox, coal from my dad, a rock from my dad, the movie the Iron Giant, Charms for my bracelet, candle, andother candle from Emma and a hemp neclace from emma, and a giant tedy bear that I named Rufus...  i can't find the cow Chris bought for me though... its depressing...  and I got a lot of blue collar cds... anyways and an orange watch...

Well... I'mma go borrow a cigarette from the pack my dad took from me, and Imma walk the dubby dog...

yeah... I'm bored....0 ( typed by alex vasapoli ) what a weirdo.... haha I'm just kidding... I love that kid... anyways... I have decided for those of you that have never seen nor know WHAT the Dubby Dog is, I will put in the picture of him, as a pup.

(Well, I had him in here, as you all know, but the picture was huge, so I will just have to figure that one out later...)

AWE!!! I love that dog....  
  Anyways... Imma go moope cuz I can't find my wallet... Peace out...
  ( Hey, that just means that Me and Chris will Chill at his house for a while.... " Heh, alllriiight")

Peace out

Hey all... again... for like the seven hundreth time today... my day was good and bad,... but if I told you ALL about it I would have to kill you...
  I worked... and I was gunna get out early... but then I get told that teh new district manager is coming in in the morning so i have to stay as late as possible and clean shit... ugh....
  Then i satyed just for nicky cuz i'm nice lile taht until Chris showed up.... Then i discover taht my cigarettes and wallet are missing... I discover this on the way to Chris's house...
  I get to my house at like 11:30... my cigarettes are on top of the fridge ... but now friggen wallet!!! AH!
  So my wallet is missing... which means i am about fifty dollars poorer, and taht I am gunna have to borrow munny to get the boys shit for christmas... GAWD!!!  
  BUT... I did stop into Dunkin Donuts on teh way home from the bus stop... and who do I see? Justin... and what does he do? does he glare? Does he yell at me for threatening him? no!!!  He just says "wats up?"  So I ask him what his issue is with me... and to my surprise... he sasy he has none...  Mae Mae lied to me and Chris... or sum one lied to her... I have just realized I don't give my baby enough credit... I love Him, and I don't ever want to hurt him again... I know I get ignorant and childish... Stubborn and naive...  Immature and pig-headed... (gods this list could go on and on...)
But I know I do it now, and I am going to do my best to stay with him and work on the qualities that have been deemed unsuitable for relationships...

So Many people ask me... WHY? Why do you love him?  well I can tell you...
1) He respects me and what I say. 
2) He respects my opinion.
3) He respects my body. 
4) He loves me. 
5) He loves me for who I am. 
6) He loves every part of me, even my untollerable rantings, and annoying mood swings. 
7) He thinks I'm Beautiful, (haha even my Godfrey nose is beautiful to him.) 
8) He's stayed around for so long, and hasn't fucked me over, as he has promised me. 
9) He's sweet to me, even after I have been unimmaginably cruel and callous to him. 
10) He would/has/could never Betray me. 
11) To him I am the most Beautiful person. 
12) He always is looking for me to get help, or thinking about OUR future, (not his or mine, OURS) 
13) He always wants to make sure I am perfectly fine with desiscions, and if he doesn't ask me when he is making them, I know he will come to me afterwards and tell me, and if it upsets me (no matter what stupid reason it upsets me for...) he will try to make me see his side, and make it up to me.
14) He wants the best for me.
15) He wants me to be happy, and will risk or give anything for that to be so.
16) He pushes for me to achieve my goals and follow through with my dreams.
17) He gives me the negative side of things even if It's not what I wnat to hear( Why is that a good and lovable trait? Because everyone needs to hear the truth, no one should be locked behind their misleading and untruthful minds forever.)
18) He not only cares about me, but about my brothers and parents, and how things at the house affect everyone in the house.
19) He is always willing to give up time for me ( well except when I wake him up too early...)
20) He is always willing to help me with my bad habbits ands problems and personality issues when he doesn't need nor deserve to go through the trouble.  My problems always become his.
21) He's willing to change for me ( Though I wouldn't change him for the world.)
22) He's always there, waiting, whether I push him out or push him away, he will always be waiting.
23) Well, Most importantly, He loves me.

I didn't list nearly enough of the things i love about him, like his smile, and the way he smells, and the goofy way he dances...  But I think all of you ignorant people who say that we aren't in love will see or at least start to see that I love him.  I love him very much.  I would give or do anything for him... I want to bare his children... lol little Connor and Kiana... maybe we will adopt a few too... Because you know what? this planet has millions of children that need homes and love and care, why do we continue to fill this worl, this undesirable place of dwelling with more mouths to feed when we can't even feed the ones already on it?
  America really is a selfish and cold0hearted country...
But anyways, I'm getting off the subject... I wrote this entry to remind me, and Chris, when I get how I often Get, Why I love him, and that I always will... no matter what I say to him.
  "I will give you your wings, I will help you to fly..."

Sarah
